titles: A proclamation, for a thanksgiving throughout the kingdom of Scotland, for the late defeat of the Kings enemies
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Monmouth, James Scott, Duke of, 1649-1685.
Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Earl of, 1629-1685.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ;
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of July, 1685.
